Package it.polimi.ingsw.Networking.Server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Networking.Server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameControllerObserver
public class Server extends Object implements GameControllerObserver
This class contains all the method needed to communicate between the players and the gameControllers

    • successfulLogin

      public void successfulLogin(Message message, String temporaryName, String newName)
      Handles the final part of the login of a client: sends a completedRequestMessage to the client, sets his clientHandler name to the name chosen by the player
      Specified by:
      successfulLogin in interface GameControllerObserver
      Parameters:
      message - is a completedRequestMessage sent to the client
      temporaryName - is the automatically assigned name to the clientHandler before the player's login
      newName - is the name indicated by the client during login
